mapper.select: select item_id, item_name, price, description, picture_url from item where item_id > 0 order by item_id desc
select item_id, item_name, price, description, picture_url from item where item_id = #{itemId}
mapper.update: update item set item_name = #{itemName}, price = #{price}, description = #{description}, picture_url = #{pictureUrl} where item_id = #{itemId}
